participant_1.background:
I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.
I've been saving up my allowance to buy a new bike.
My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques.
i have 8 brothers and we are close.
I sometimes have a hard time relating to people who don't share my interests.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.
i do not want a job.
my job involves building drones.
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I remember playing street hockey with my friends in the summer.

content.text: I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.
I am passionate about being a good dog parent to my collie.
That is lovely! I only have a cat.
Collies are great dogs. I would love to have more one day.
I knit a lot and I have always wanted to knit a sweater for my dog, but I have not figured out the pattern yet.
That would be so cute! I would love to see pictures of it if you ever figure it out.
I will! I am a bit of a loner. I have 8 brothers and we are very close, but they all live away from home now.
I used to play street hockey with my friends in the summer. Those were some good times.
I would love to learn to play hockey. I have been saving up my allowance to buy a new bike.
Do you want to go for a bike ride sometime? I would love to show you around my neighborhood.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to go for a bike ride with you.
